name: crypto_convert
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool currencies_and_countries.
Tool description: Convert currencies, get country informations.
API description: Converts a specified amount from one cryptocurrency to another using the RapidAPI service.

is_from.description: The cryptocurrency to convert from (default is 'ETH').

to.description: The cryptocurrency to convert to (default is 'BTC').

amount.description: The amount of cryptocurrency to convert (default is '100').
